name: Message In A Bottle.
description:
This is a game about the idea of giving up control and accepting that our message is sometimes just lost at sea for a while.


Controls: 
Escape- Pause
WASD- movement (when the winds are kind)
It was made as part of the Game Makers Tool Kit from the brief: Out of control.

Made by Nate Bedford, Marcus Yarnell & Will Jennett.
